pros: Has clones that attack for you
Very mobile class, good for mobbing
Lots of utility with skills that create damaging zones, portals, and provide invincibility
Has 2 iFrames Sage: Dream of Shangri-La and Sage: Wrath of Gods
Has a bind skill Sage: Tai Yu Clone
cons: Has to two different special resources to maintain to use certain skills
Lots of your attacks have cooldowns requiring you to make skill rotations
Complex class with high skill ceiling

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives and buffs with cooldowns
Ignore DEF: +20% + (up to 10% from Link Skill)

extraContent.title: Talisman Energy and Scroll Energy
extraContent.content:
Hoyoung has two secondary resources called Talisman Energy and Scroll Energy that are used for Talisman Skills and Scroll Skills. In Hoyoung's gauge, the inner circle is the Talisman Energy and the outer ring is the Scroll Energy. Talisman Energy is charged by using Basic Skills and Scroll Energy is charged by using Talisman Skills and Basic Skills.

Hoyoung's Basic Skills are split into 3 different attributes, Humanity, Earth, and Heaven. On Hoyoung's gauge, you'll notice three orbs, this is your Attribute Combo, each representing a different attribute. Using a unique attribute will increase the stage of your Attribute Combo and grant bonus Talisman Energy. Once you consume all three orbs (Stage 3), the Attribute Combo resets

Talisman Energy is unlocked at 1st Job while Scroll Energy is unlocked at 3rd Job

details: Skill is gained as you complete the storyline
Skill is gained as you complete the storyline

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)
This skill is gained and leveled up by completing the Hoyoung storyline

primary.desc: Whenever you damage an enemy with a Basic Skill (Heaven, Earth or Humanity skills), you charge your Talisman Energy
details:
Each time you use a Heaven, Earth or Humanity skill for the first time, you gain bonus Talisman Energy
  • Once all three types are used, the count will reset

primary.desc: Swings your fan forward
details: Enemies hit by the actual fan part of the skill take increased %Final Damage

primary.desc: Swallows up nearby enemies into your gourd
details: Pressing the Skill Key again launches all enemies swallowed
Cannot swallow boss monsters, stationary monsters or monsters too higher level than you
Deals increased %Boss Damage

primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Can be used up to twice in a row

primary.desc: Allows you to fly temporarily
details: You can move by pressing the Arrow Keys

If toggled to unlocked, you can also hold Jump and Arrow Key together to use Nimbus Cloud
  • You can Lock and Unlock by right clicking the Skill in the Skills Tab
Unlocked by completing main storyline

primary.desc: Sends out a shockwave forward
details:
If you press the Forward Arrow Key and the Skill Key again, you will dash forward
  • If you do not press anything, a clone will be created instead that dashes forward
Clone version is unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.desc: While active, your attacks creates clones that attack nearby enemies
details: Deals increased %Damage to non-boss monsters

primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
Whenever you use the clone version of Basic Skills (like ), you become hidden and cannot be hit by enemies similar to Dark Sight
details: Additionally, permanently increases %Avoidability

primary.desc: Whenever you damage an enemy with a Basic Skill or Talisman Skill, you charge your Scroll Energy
Leap into the air and blow a gale downwards
details:
If you press the Forward Arrow Key and the Skill Key again, you will leap forward
  • If you do not press anything, a clone will be created instead that leaps forward
Clone version is unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.desc: Stones emerge from the ground damaging and stunning nearby enemies
details:
If you press the Left or Right Key and the Skill Key again, you will teleport towards that direction
  • If you do not press anything, a clone will be created instead that dashes forward
Only usable while on the ground
Clone version is unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.desc: Summons a flame spirit that seeks and attacks nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.desc: Transforms nearby enemies into frogs, bug and other creatures
details: Cannot transform bosses but deals increased damage to bosses
Transformed enemies have reduced %DEF

primary.desc: Creates a burst of flames that launches upwards
details:
If you press the Up Arrow Key and the Skill Key again, you will dash upwards
  • If you do not press anything, a clone will be created instead that dashes upwards
Can only be used in the air
Clone version is unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.desc: Strikes forward and then delivers a final swing attack
details: Does not charge any Talisman or Scroll Energy
The final swing deals increased damage
Deals increased %Boss Damage

primary.desc: Transform into a stone that drops straight down crushing enemies
details: Enemies hit gain a bleeding debuff
Can only be used in the air

You can activate this skill by pressing the Skill Key or tapping the Down Arrow key twice<ul><li>You can Right-click this skill to lock it, preventing the skill from activating by pressing the Down Arrow Keys

primary.desc: Creates a gate at your position that you can teleport back to while it is active
details:
To teleport, press the Skill Key again
  • After teleporting, using the skill again while near the gate teleports you back to your previous lcoation
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Avoidability

primary.desc: Creates a vortex on the ground that damages nearby enemies
details:
While the skill is active, you accumulate Energy from enemies hit by the vortex
  • If you press the Skill Key again, or when the vortex disappears, you and your party members will restore %HP/MP based on how much energy was stored
  • Attacking bosses will generate more Energy

primary.desc: While active, your attacks create butterflies that seek and attack nearby enemies
details: Additionally, while active, gain increased %Final Damage
[Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

details: Increases %Weapon Mastery and Attack provided
Now increases %Final Damage
Increases %p Damage increased provided
Now increases %Damage
Increases the %Damage of , , , , and
Increases %Ignore DEF for , , , , and
Increases the %Boss Damage of , , , , and

hyperActive.desc: Increases %Final Damage and periodically generates Talisman Energy and Scroll Energy

details: Depending on how long the skill was held, the cooldown will be shorter
Holding the skill for the full duration will result in the full cooldown

hyperActive.desc: Binds the highest Max HP within range

fifthMain.name: Sage: Clone Rampage
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, For 30 sec, create 12 clone(s) when attacking, Each clone attacks for 800%p more damage than Talisman: Clone 2 times\nClone creation has a 1.5 sec cooldown\nCooldown: 200 sec
fifthMain.desc: Can only be used while is active. While is active, the number of clones created is increased and are more powerful

fifthMain.name: Scroll: Tiger of Songyu
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Scroll Energy Cost: 900, Duration: 57 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1800%, Number of Attacks: 8
When you reach attribute combo stage 3, its next attack is a roar that periodically deals 700% damage 4 times.
Tiger's attacks have a cooldown of 3 sec
Cooldown: 200 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a tiger that attacks nearby enemies
details: Each time you use all 3 of the Basic Skill attributes for your Talisman Energy, the tiger's next attack will be a mighty roar
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Sage: Wrath of God
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 30 sec, Damage: +70%
The gods strike once per 12 successful attacks, hitting up to 10 enemies for 1700% damage 8 times, Cooldown: 1.5 sec
Using the skill again will immediately end its effects and summon the gods at once, creating 6 shockwave(s) that attacks up to 15 enemies for 2000% damage 12 times.
You are invincible while summoning the gods. It negates attack ignore and attack reflection effects.
Cooldown: 200 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons giant gods that periodically attacks enemies
details:
When the Skill Key is pressed again, or when the duration ends, the gods will appear unleashing a massive attack
  • You are invincible during this period
  • Unaffected by Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Sage: Three Paths Apparition
fifthMain.shortDesc: Passive Effect: clones appears to attack up to 4 enemies with 1250% damage 6 times, cooldown: 5 sec\nActive Effect: MP Cost: 1250, passvie effect can activate 2 times without cooldown for 30 sec, then cooldown of 2 sec applied afterwards, Cooldown: 100 sec
fifthMain.desc: Using a Basic Skill will create an additional clone attack that counts towards a different attribute than the one used for your gauge
details: [Active Buff]: While active, two additional attacks will be created instead of one

meta: Hoyoung is LUK thief class part of the Anima class group. Hoyoung has two secondary resources called Talisman Energy and Scroll Energy
